StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMOSsByOccupa.onCode]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @strOccupa.onCode char(2) = NULL ) AS
-- from sp_GetMOSs /* 2014-02-06 Paul Jemiolo Added "and MOS_CODE Not In(5942) " to where clause See below
Changed Where Clause from:
WHERE (LEN(@Occupa.onCode) > 0 AND RIGHT(MOS_CODE, 2) != ''00'' AND OCCUPATION_CODE = @Occupa.onCode) OR (LEN(@Occupa.onCode) = 0)
To: WHERE MOS_CODE Not In(5942) and (LEN(@Occupa.onCode) > 0 AND RIGHT(MOS_CODE, 2) != ''00'' AND OCCUPATION_CODE = @Occupa.onCode) OR (LEN(@Occupa.onCode) = 0) Reason: We needed to exclude this defunct code from the drop down list without dele.ng the history of its use in the QSN table.
*/
SET @strOccupa.onCode = COALESCE(@strOccupa.onCode, SPACE(0))
SELECT MOS_CODE, /* // CM: this is what use to be in the original stored proc. // however, even though this part says to prepend the MOS_CODE // only when occupa.on code is null, the app s.ll prepends // the MOS_CODE (must be being done in code) CASE WHEN @strOccupa.onCode IS NULL OR LEN(@strOccupa.onCode) = 0 THEN MOS_CODE + '' - '' ELSE SPACE(0) END + SHORT_DESCRIPTION AS SHORT_DESCRIPTION, */ SHORT_DESCRIPTION, OCCUPATION_CODE FROM MOS WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ( LEN(@strOccupa.onCode) > 0 and MOS_Code Not In(5942) AND RIGHT(MOS_CODE, 2) != '00' AND OCCUPATION_CODE = @strOccupa.onCode ) OR LEN(@strOccupa.onCode) = 0 ORDER BY MOS_CODE
